Package com.mozilla.secops.httprequest

HTTP request threshold and error rate monitoring

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HTTPRequest.HTTPRequestOptions
    Runtime options for HTTPRequest pipeline.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTTPRequest
    HTTPRequest describes and implements a Beam pipeline for analysis of HTTP requests using log data.
    HTTPRequest.EndpointAbuseAnalysis
    Transform for detection of a single source making excessive requests of a specific endpoint path solely.
    HTTPRequest.EndpointAbuseAnalysis.EndpointAbuseEndpointInfo
    Internal class for configured endpoints in EPA
    HTTPRequest.EndpointAbuseAnalysis.EndpointAbuseState
    Internal class for endpoint abuse state
    HTTPRequest.ErrorRateAnalysis
    Transform for analysis of error rates per client within a given window.
    HTTPRequest.HardLimitAnalysis
    Transform for analysis of hard per-source request count limit within fixed window
    HTTPRequest.KeyAndWindowForSessionsFireEarly
    Key requests for session analysis and window into sessions
    HTTPRequest.ThresholdAnalysis
    Composite transform that conducts threshold analysis using the configured threshold modifier
    HTTPRequest.UserAgentBlacklistAnalysis
    Analysis to identify known bad user agents
    HTTPRequest.WindowForFixed
    Window events into fixed one minute windows
    HTTPRequestElementFilter
    Post-input filter for per-element analysis
    HTTPRequestMultiMode
    HTTPRequest multimode configuration
    HTTPRequestResourceTag
    Add monitored resource indicator
    HTTPRequestToggles
    Configuration toggles for HTTPRequest pipeline analysis

Package com.mozilla.secops.httprequest Description

HTTP request threshold and error rate monitoring
